Ashland.text:
Advanced Nursing Assistant
Learn knowledge and skills for nurse aides to assume the role and responsibility required
                                 in a variety of health care settings.

Air Conditioning Technology
Design, build, and maintain climate control systems through hands-on training for
                                 a career as a heating, ventilation and air conditioning technician.

Appalachian Studies
Discover the unique history and culture of our region. This versatile certificate
                                 program can lead to further studies in science, communications, writing, music and
                                 more.

Applied Process Technologies
Enter the booming, lucrative world of chemical manufacturing and other process industries
                                 with a solid background in automated and semi-automated systems.

Associate in Arts
AA degree transferring to a University for continued education in studies such as
                                 Elementary Education, Psychology, Social Work.

Associate in Science
AS degree transferring to a University for continued education in studies such as
                                 Biology, Engineering, Pre-Physical Therapy, Pre-Med, Pre-Vet

Automotive Technology
Go beyond car repair with this comprehensive program. You'll gain the technical expertise
                                 necessary to diagnose, repair and maintain today's high-tech automotive systems.

Business Administration
Can you picture yourself in an office setting, collaborating with a team to solve
                                 business problems? We can help you get there.

Computer Aided Drafting and Design
Draw your way to a bright future with high-tech CAD training. Our program trains you
                                 to make detailed, accurate specifications for use in manufacturing and construction.

Computer and Information Technologies
Get the hands on experience you need to design, maintain and use different computing
                                 technologies.

Computerized Manufacturing and Machining
Gain job-ready skills in cutting-edge computerized manufacturing methods and computer-aided
                                 drafting techniques.

Cosmetology and Esthetics
Style your way to success. Break into the beauty business or take your salon skills
                                 to the next level with a comprehensive education in hair, skin and nail care.

Criminal Justice
Serve your community while promoting public safety. Our degree and certificate programs
                                 prepare for you for police, corrections, or security careers.

Culinary Arts
Do you have a passion for food? Wherever the path might lead you, our dedicated staff
                                 and chefs will guide you toward your culinary goal.

Diesel Technology
Fuel your career with hands-on experience servicing medium and heavy-duty trucks.
                                 The trucking industry is growing, along with job opportunities for skilled technicians.

Electrical Technology
Amp up your career with specialized training in electrical theory and hands-on practice
                                 to become an industrial or construction electrician.

Emergency Medical Technician
Get ready to meet the challenges of being an emergency responder in the 21st Century.

Health Science Technology
Launch your healthcare career with versatile, job-ready training for a variety of
                                 medical fields, including aging, recovery, administration and nursing.

Industrial Maintenance Technology
Install, repair and maintain the machinery used in manufacturing and industry. You'll
                                 become a versatile, in-demand problem solver.

Interdisciplinary Early Childhood Education
Inspire a love of learning. You’ll learn about children's growth from birth through
                                 age five and prepare to work in preschools, Head Start programs or childcare centers.

Medical Assisting
Work alongside physicians as a multi-skilled healthcare professional. In this innovative,
                                 accelerated program, you’ll work at a sponsoring company while taking classes.

Medical Information Technology
Connect your people skills with technical know-how for administrative work in the
                                 medical field, including coding, transcription and billing.
Nursing - Practical Nursing
Nursing

Pre-Engineering
The pre-engineering curriculum at ACTC is lead to an Associate in Science Degree and
                                 are transferable to many engineering programs. Taking courses at ACTC gives you the
                                 advantage of small classes that maximize your learning opportunities while staying
                                 close to home at an affordable cost.

Radiography
Develop a dynamic career in medical imaging with a comprehensive associate degree
                                 in radiography that includes specialized courses and hands-on clinical practice.

Respiratory Care
Learn to use life-saving equipment and care for patients with lung or heart problems,
                                 while entering a field that's full of opportunity.

Surgical Technology
Support doctors and other medical professionals as an operating room technician. You’ll
                                 learn to prepare for and assist during surgeries as part of a healthcare team.

Welding Technology
Discover materials and techniques for work in many industries as a specialist in one
                                 of the most highly paid skilled trades.

Can you picture yourself in an office setting, collaborating with a team to solve

                                 prepares you to assist in planning and building roads, bridges and other infrastructure.

Master industry-current auto body repair techniques with our accredited, hands-on
                                 training programs.
Community Dental Health Coordinator

Computer Aided Drafting and Design
Draw your way to a bright future with high-tech CAD training. Our program trains you
                                 to make detailed, accurate specifications for use in manufacturing and construction.

Get the hands on experience you need to design, maintain and use different computing
                                 technologies.

Construction Technology
Build a solid foundation for a career in construction. Prepare for highly skilled
                                 jobs in residential or commercial building or become an independent contractor.

Criminal Justice
Serve your community while promoting public safety. Our degree and certificate programs
                                 prepare for you for police, corrections, or security careers.

Cybersecurity
Prepare to design, develop, and maintain secure computer systems and provide security
                                 for the users you service.

Dental Assisting Program and Dental Hygiene Program
Create beautiful smiles for a living as a dental assistant or hygienist. Gain the
                                 technical and interpersonal skills essential for work in a dentist’s office.

Diesel Technology
Fuel your career with hands-on experience servicing medium and heavy-duty trucks.
                                 The trucking industry is growing, along with job opportunities for skilled technicians.

Education Teacher Preparation
Kickstart your journey toward teaching certification with affordable courses designed
                                 to transfer to the four-year school of your choice.

Electrical Technology
Amp up your career with specialized training in electrical theory and hands-on practice
                                 to become an industrial or construction electrician.

Emergency Medical Services
Level up your life-saving skills. If you’re already a certified EMT, in 12 months,
                                 you could be a paramedic.

Engineering and Electronics Technology
Supercharge your earning potential with specialized, high-tech training for in-demand
                                 engineering and electronics jobs.

General Occupational/Technical Studies
Earn a diploma in Air Conditioning Technology, Construction Technology, Collision
                                 Repair, Computer Aided Drafting and Design, Industrial Maintenance or Welding.

Health Science Technology
Launch your healthcare career with versatile, job-ready training for a variety of
                                 medical fields, including aging, recovery, administration and nursing.

Human Services
Affect change through meaningful work helping people in need. Our programs train you
                                 for careers in social, community, education and mental health services.

Industrial Maintenance Technology
Install, repair and maintain the machinery used in manufacturing and industry. You'll
                                 become a versatile, in-demand problem solver.

Medical Information Technology
Use your laboratory skills to help diagnose and treat patients in the healthcare industry.

Nursing
Learn key Nursing skills and practice them in a variety of real-world settings.

Respiratory Care
Learn to use life-saving equipment and care for patients with lung or heart problems,
                                 while entering a field that's full of opportunity.

Visual Communication - Design & Technology
Make creative, eye-catching multimedia for today’s fast-paced world. Learn the art
                                 of animation, audio/video production, web design and graphic design.

Welding Technology
Discover materials and techniques for work in many industries as a specialist in one
                                 of the most highly paid skilled trades.

Bluegrass.text:
Administrative Office Technology
Excel in any office by sharpening your business communication skills. You’ll master
                                 word processing, email, desktop publishing, graphics, databases and spreadsheets.

Advanced Manufacturing Technology

Equine Studies
Get on track with professional training for a career working with horses. Our programs
                                 can lead to a position as a jockey, horseman or racing official.

Filmmaking and Cinematic Arts
Lights! Camera! Action! This certificate gives you hands-on, project-based overview

Interdisciplinary Early Childhood Education
Inspire a love of learning. You’ll learn about children's growth from birth through

Library Information Technology
A library is more than just a building full of books. It's a space to learn, create,
                                 and connect with the past, present, and future.

Medical Assisting
Work alongside physicians as a multi-skilled healthcare professional.  The program
                                 combines lecture, lab, and practicum courses with externships making our graduates
                                 well-rounded and setting them up for success in the healthcare field.

Medical Information Technology
Develop professional skills to assist healthcare professionals and patients complete
                                 the administrative, medical records, coding and billing processes in the healthcare

Medicaid Nurse Aide
Learn key nursing skills and practice them in a variety of real-world settings.

Practical Nursing
Learn key nursing skills and practice them in a variety of real-world settings.

Nursing
Learn key nursing skills and practice them in a variety of real-world settings.

Orthotic & Prosthetic Technology
Orthotic & Prosthetic Technicians fabricate, fit, maintain, or repair medical supportive
                                 devices, such as braces, orthotics and prosthetic devices, joints, arch supports,
                                 and other surgical and medical appliances.

Paramedic Technology
Step up to the challenges on an emergency responder. If you’re a certified EMT, you
                                 can level up to a paramedic in 12 months.

Pharmacy Technology
Help registered pharmacists prepare medications. There’s a growing demand for pharmacy
                                 techs as our population ages and new drugs go on the market every day.

Surgical Technology

                                 learn to prepare for and assist during surgeries as part of a healthcare team.

Theatre
Raise the curtain on your theatre career. Hone your craft while performing, directing,
                                 or working behind the scenes to produce on-campus productions.

Welding Technology
Discover materials and techniques for work in many industries as a specialist in one
                                 of the most highly paid skilled trades.

Massage isn't purely a luxury. Massage therapy is now considered an accepted method

                                 to become an industrial or construction electrician.

Heavy Equipment Operation
Safely operate heavy equipment, including bulldozers, backhoes, front-end loaders,
                                 hydraulic excavators, and graders, completing small and large construction/land projects.

Human Services
Affect change through meaningful work helping people in need. Our programs train you
                                 for careers in social, community, education and mental health services.

Interdisciplinary Early Childhood Education
Inspire a love of learning. You’ll learn about children's growth from birth through
                                 age five and prepare to work in preschools, Head Start programs or childcare centers.

Lineman Training
If you like to be outdoors, love challenges, and aren't afraid of heights, being a
                                 professional Lineman is a career to consider.

Manufacturing Engineering Technology
Solve high-tech problems every day as an electronics, industrial automation or computer
                                 maintenance professional.

Medical Information Technology
Use your technical know-how for administrative work in the medical field, including
                                 management, coding, medical records, and billing.

Medical Lab Technician
Connect your people skills with technical know-how for specimen collection, blood
                                 draws, transfusions, research, or urinalysis/serology.

Nurse Aide
Provide basic nursing care to patients, helping to carry out daily tasks, as needed.
                                 Nurse aides can work home care, hospitals, nursing homes, and other health care centers.

Nursing - Licensed Practical Nursing
Train for your LPN in 12 months. LPNs perform basic medical tasks, including checking
                                 vital signs, start IV Fluids, feed patients, and maintain clear communications among
                                 the healthcare team and patient.

Nursing - RN
Learn key nursing skills to provide full patient care including communication with
                                 doctors and administering medications. Nurses work in various settings and can advance
                                 to specialty areas.

Physical Therapist Assistant
Provide healing help to people of all ages recovering from illness or injury. Learn
                                 how our bodies work and train to aid licensed therapists in this growing field.

Professional Studio Artist
Create a professional sound all your own with a degree as a Professional Studio Artist.
                                 Make beautiful music in the Bluegrass and Traditional style.

Radiography
Develop a dynamic career in medical imaging with a comprehensive associate degree
                                 in radiography that includes specialized courses and hands-on clinical practice.

Surgical Technology
Support doctors and other medical professionals as an operating room technician. You’ll
                                 learn to prepare for and assist during surgeries as part of a healthcare team.

Surveying and Mapping Technology
Survey projects and collect data to perform routine topographical, boundary projects
                                 to make maps of the Earth's surface.

Truck Driver Training (CDL)
Pave your path by transporting goods and materials across the open highway.

Unmanned Systems Technology
Soar to new heights in your career! Drone technology is one of the fastest growing
                                 sectors of the economy.

Visual Communications
Make creative, eye-catching multimedia for today’s fast-paced world. Learn the art
                                 of animation, audio/video production, web design and graphic design.

Welding Technology
Discover materials and techniques for work in many industries as a specialist in one
                                 of the most highly paid skilled trades.

Install, repair and maintain the machinery used in manufacturing and industry.

Grow your knowledge by studying agriculture. You’ll explore sustainable and organic

Associate in Science
Henderson Community College offers Associate in Science degrees same as the first
                                 two years at four-year colleges and universities.

Business Administration
Can you picture yourself in an office setting, collaborating with a team to solve
                                 business problems? We can help you get there.

Computer and Information Technologies
Get the hands on experience you need to design, maintain and use different computing
                                 technologies.

HCC FAME
A partnership of regional manufacturers whose purpose is to implement a work-and-learn
                                 style training that will create a pipeline of highly skilled workers.

Health Science Technology
Launch your healthcare career with versatile, job-ready training for a variety of
                                 medical fields, including aging, recovery, administration and nursing.

Interdisciplinary Early Childhood Education
Inspire a love of learning. You’ll learn about children's growth from birth through
                                 age five and prepare to work in preschools, Head Start programs or childcare centers.

Medical Assisting
Work alongside physicians as a multi-skilled healthcare professional in a fast-pace
                                 environment while serving as a patient advocate.

Medical Laboratory Technician
Positively impact the health of patients and our communities by becoming a laboratory
                                 professional.

Nursing Assistant/Nurse Aide
Become a nursing assistant or aide, fully qualified and certified to provide superior
                                 clinical support for patients who need long-term care.

Nursing
Learn key nursing skills and practice them in a variety of real-world settings.

Pharmacy Technician
There’s a growing demand for pharmacy techs as our population ages and new drugs go
                                 on the market every day.

Teacher Education
Help shape the minds of the future with a program 2 + 2 education with our partner
                                 Murray State University.

Welding Technology
Train to become a certified welder. Discover materials and techniques for work in
                                 many industries as a specialist in one of the most highly paid skilled trades.

Jefferson.text:
African American Studies
African American Studies will engage students as they seek to learn about African
                                 American society and their experiences through history, literature, music and more.

Applied Process Technologies
Enter the booming, lucrative world of chemical manufacturing and other process industries
                                 with a solid background in automated and semi-automated systems.

Apprenticeship Studies
An accelerated path to an Associate in Applied Science degree for students who have
                                 already completed an approved apprenticeship program.

Associate in Arts
Earn an AA degree to transfer to a university for continued education in studies such
                                 as Elementary Education, Psychology, and Social Work.

Associate in Science
Earn an AS degree to transfer to a university for continued education in studies such
                                 as Biology, Engineering, Pre-Physical Therapy, Pre-Med, and Pre-Vet.

Automotive Technology
Go beyond car repair with this comprehensive program. You'll gain the technical expertise
                                 necessary to diagnose, repair and maintain today's high-tech automotive systems.

Aviation Maintenance Technology
Reach new heights with FAA-certified training in the inspection, repair, service and
                                 overhaul of aircraft and engines.

Business Administration
Can you picture yourself in an office setting, collaborating with a team to solve
                                 business problems? We can help you get there.

Commercial Driver's License Training
Jefferson’s CDL Training Program teaches students to safely operate trucks and gives
                                 them a working knowledge of the trucking industry.

Communication Arts Technology
Make creative, eye-catching multimedia for today's fast-paced world. Learn the art
                                 of animation, audio/video production, web design and graphic design.

Computer and Information Technologies
Get the hands on experience you need to design, maintain and use different computing
                                 technologies.

Computerized Manufacturing and Machining
Gain job-ready skills in cutting-edge computerized manufacturing methods and computer-aided
                                 drafting techniques.

Construction Technology
Build a solid foundation for a career in construction. Prepare for highly skilled
                                 jobs in residential or commercial building or become an independent contractor.

Criminal Justice
Serve your community while promoting public safety. Our degree and certificate programs
                                 prepare for you for police, corrections, or security careers.

Culinary Arts
Do you have a passion for food? Wherever the path might lead you, our dedicated staff
                                 and chefs will guide you toward your culinary goal.

Education
Kickstart your journey toward teaching certification with affordable courses designed
                                 to transfer to the four-year school of your choice.

Engineering and Electronics Technology
Supercharge your earning potential with specialized, high-tech training for in-demand
                                 engineering and electronics jobs.

Fire/Rescue Science Technology
Stop, drop, roll and get ready to meet the challenges of being an emergency responder
                                 in the 21st Century.

General Occupational/Technical Studies
Earn a diploma in Air Conditioning Technology, Construction Technology, Collision
                                 Repair, Computer Aided Drafting and Design, Industrial Maintenance or Welding.

Global Studies
Engage with the world by studying the interconnected nature of economics, politics,
                                 science, societies and cultures across the globe.

Health Information Technology
Expand your skills by learning the latest patient-record technologies. Our program
                                 prepares you for the Registered Health Information Technician certification exam.

Heating & Air Conditioning Technology
Design, build, and maintain climate control systems through hands-on training for
                                 a career as a heating, ventilation and air conditioning technician.

Human Services
Affect change through meaningful work helping people in need. Our programs train you
                                 for careers in social, community, education and mental health services.

Industrial Maintenance Technology
Install, repair and maintain the machinery used in manufacturing and industry. You'll
                                 become a versatile, in-demand problem solver.

Interdisciplinary Early Childhood Education
Inspire a love of learning. You’ll learn about children's growth from birth through
                                 age five and prepare to work in preschools, Head Start programs or childcare centers.

KYFAME
The program combines college coursework with paid, on-the-job training, and leads
                                 you to your certification as an Advanced Manufacturing Technician

Lineman Training
Jefferson’s Lineman Training program prepares student to enter and be successful in
                                 the Line Utility Industry.

Medical Assisting
Work alongside physicians as a multi-skilled healthcare professional. In this innovative,
                                 accelerated program, you’ll work at a sponsoring company while taking classes.

Medical Coding and Reimbursement Specialist
Learn how to protect both human and financial assets against of accidental loss through
                                 assessments, analysis and evaluation techniques.

Medical Laboratory Technician
Use your laboratory skills to help diagnose and treat patients in the healthcare industry.

Mercedes-Benz
Mercedes-Benz Accelerate is the fast track to a high-demand career as a certified
                                 technician.  Get in and out in just three semesters.

Modern Languages
A comprehensive study of Spanish grammar and culture in Latin America and peninsular
                                 Spain, French grammar and culture in Africa and France, and American Sign Language.

Medicaid Nurse Aide
Learn key nursing skills to provide direct care for patients in real-world settings.

Practical Nursing Program
Looking for a rewarding and challenging career? Become a nurse! You’ll learn key nursing
                                 skills and practice them in a variety of real-world settings.

Associate Degree Nursing
Learn key Nursing skills and practice them in a variety of real-world settings.

Occupational Therapy Assistant
Promote health and healing. In this program, you’ll assist occupational therapists,
                                 who help people recovering from illness get back to the everyday tasks of work and
                                 life.

Paramedic Technology
Level up your life-saving skills. If you’re a certified EMT, our selective-admission
                                 associate degree program offers advanced prep for the National Registry Exam.

Pharmacy Technology
Help registered pharmacists prepare medications. There’s a growing demand for pharmacy
                                 techs as our population ages and new drugs go on the market every day.

Physical Therapist Assistant
Provide healing help to people of all ages recovering from illness or injury. Learn
                                 how our bodies work and train to aid licensed therapists in this growing field.

Plumbing Technology
Take the plunge into a high-demand, well-paid trade. Because water is everywhere,
                                 you can work anywhere installing, repairing and maintaining plumbing systems.

Radiography
Develop a dynamic career in medical imaging with a comprehensive associate degree
                                 in radiography that includes specialized courses and hands-on clinical practice.

Respiratory Care
Learn to use life-saving equipment and care for patients with lung or heart problems,
                                 while entering a field that's full of opportunity.

Surgical Technology
Support doctors and other medical professionals as an operating room technician. You’ll
                                 learn to prepare for and assist during surgeries as part of a healthcare team.

Toyota T-TEN
Train and develop the quality skills needed in automotive technology through classroom
                                 study and hands-on automotive dealership experience.

Welding Technology
Discover materials and techniques for work in many industries as a specialist in one
                                 of the most highly paid skilled trades.

Women’s and Gender Studies
Learn to analyze the influence of gender in social, cultural, and political systems,
                                 and how they influence experiences, culture, policy, and social systems.

Use your technology skills in a medical office to help support patient care.

Medical Laboratory Technician
Challenge yourself by saving lives in the Medical Laboratory Science field.

Nursing
Learn key nursing skills and practice them in a variety of real-world settings.

Radiography
Develop a dynamic career in medical imaging with  specialized courses and hands-on
                                 clinical practice.

Respiratory Care
Learn to use life-saving equipment and care for patients with lung or heart problems.

Surgical Technology
Support doctors and other medical professionals as an operating room technician.

Welding Technology
Go to work in many industries as a specialist in one of the most highly paid skilled
                                 trades.

Southeast.text:
Digital Printing Technology - 3D Printing
Visualize your future with Kentucky’s first-ever certificate in 3-D printing. This
                                 red-hot technology offers limitless possibilities in almost every industry.

Air Conditioning Technology
Design, build, and maintain climate control systems through hands-on training for
                                 a career as a heating, ventilation and air conditioning technician.

Associate in Arts
AA degree transferring to a University for continued education in studies such as
                                 Elementary Education, Psychology, Social Work.

Associate in Science
AS degree transferring to a University for continued education in studies such as
                                 Biology, Engineering, Pre-Physical Therapy, Pre-Med, Pre-Vet

Automotive Technology
Go beyond car repair with this comprehensive program. You'll gain the technical expertise
                                 necessary to diagnose, repair and maintain today's high-tech automotive systems.

Aviation
Learn how to fly and earn FAA approved certifications to become a pilot or flight
                                 instructor.

Business Administration
Can you picture yourself in an office setting, collaborating with a team to solve
                                 business problems? We can help you get there.

Computed Tomography
Advance in your medical imaging career with a CT certificate. Online classes and a
                                 clinical practice course can be completed in only two semesters.

Computer and Information Technologies
Get real-world instruction on computer hardware, software, web design, routers, and
                                 the underlying technology in our CIT program.

Computerized Manufacturing & Machining
Gain job-ready skills in cutting-edge computerized manufacturing methods and computer-aided
                                 drafting techniques.

Construction Technology
Build a solid foundation for a career in construction. Prepare for highly skilled
                                 jobs in residential or commercial building or become an independent contractor.

Criminal Justice
Serve your community while promoting public safety. Our degree and certificate programs
                                 prepare for you for police, corrections, or security careers.

Diesel Technology
Fuel your career with hands-on experience servicing medium and heavy-duty trucks.
                                 The trucking industry is growing, along with job opportunities for skilled technicians.

Education
Kickstart your journey toward teaching certification with affordable courses designed
                                 to transfer to the four-year school of your choice.

Electrical Technology
Amp up your career with specialized training in electrical theory and hands-on practice
                                 to become an industrial or construction electrician.

Emergency Medical Technician
Get ready to meet the challenges of being an emergency responder in the 21st Century.

General Occupation/Technical Studies
We combine work experience and skills in different areas to meet the unique needs
                                 of your future employers.

Human Services
Affect change through meaningful work helping people in need. Our programs train you
                                 for careers in social, community, education and mental health services.

Industrial Maintenance Technology
Install, repair and maintain the machinery used in manufacturing and industry. You'll
                                 become a versatile, in-demand problem solver.

Medical Assisting
Work alongside physicians as a multi-skilled healthcare professional. In this innovative,
                                 accelerated program, you’ll work at a sponsoring company while taking classes.

Medical Coding
Learn how to enter and bill the appropriate code for medical diagnoses and procedures.

Nurse Aide
Learn key nursing skills and practice them in a variety of real-world settings.

Nursing
Learn key nursing skills and practice them in a variety of real-world settings.

Paramedic Technology
Level up your life-saving skills. If you’re a certified EMT, our selective-admission
                                 associate degree program offers advanced prep for the National Registry Exam.

Phlebotomy
Phlebotomy technicians collect blood from patients and prepare the samples for testing.

Physical Therapist Assistant
Provide healing help to people of all ages recovering from illness or injury. Learn
                                 how our bodies work and train to aid licensed therapists in this growing field.

Pineville Radiography
Develop a dynamic career in medical imaging with a comprehensive associate degree
                                 in Pineville Radiography that includes specialized courses and hands-on clinical practice.

Pineville Respiratory Care
Learn to use life-saving equipment and care for patients with lung or heart problems,
                                 while entering a field that's full of opportunity.

Plumbing Technology
Take the plunge into a high-demand, well-paid trade. Because water is everywhere,
                                 you can work anywhere installing, repairing and maintaining plumbing systems.

Whitesburg Regional Radiography
Develop a dynamic career in medical imaging with a comprehensive associate degree
                                 in Radiography that includes specialized courses and hands-on clinical practice.

Surgical Technology
Support doctors and other medical professionals as an operating room technician. You’ll
                                 learn to prepare for and assist during surgeries as part of a healthcare team.

Telehealth Technician Associate
Connect to the world of online healthcare as a Telehealth Technician Assistant, assist
                                 patients from the any location from the comfort of their home.

Welding Technology
Discover materials and techniques for work in many industries as a specialist in one
                                 of the most highly paid skilled trades.

Whitesburg Respiratory Care
Learn to use life-saving equipment and care for patients with lung or heart problems,
                                 while entering a field that's full of opportunity.
